title: ECADEMIX
description: A full-featured MERN Stack education website with courses, login, admin panel and more.
fullDescription: ECADEMIX is a comprehensive online education platform built using the MERN stack. It features user authentication, instructor and student dashboards, a powerful admin panel, course management, enrollment system, payment integration, wishlist, and secure APIs with JWT. The UI is built with Tailwind CSS, providing a clean and responsive design.
challengesFaced: Managing different user roles (admin, student, instructor) and syncing course data securely between front-end and back-end was challenging. Also, integrating payment systems with role-based route protection required careful handling.
futurePlan: Plan to add real-time chat between students and instructors, course reviews, certificate generation, and a mobile app version.

title: Marathon Pro
description: A dynamic marathon management system with coach registration, runner dashboard, and results.
fullDescription: Marathon Pro is a professional marathon management web application. It allows event organizers to create marathons, register coaches, track runners, and display real-time results. It includes runner dashboards, coach details, and admin features. Built using React, Express, MongoDB, and animated with Framer Motion, it offers a modern and interactive experience.
challengesFaced: Handling conditional rendering based on marathon status (upcoming, ongoing, ended), managing live data updates and route protection logic were complex. Also, ensuring performance with larger data sets was tricky.
futurePlan: Planning to integrate live GPS tracking for runners, email notifications, and automated leaderboard updates.

title: DreamArc
description: Crowdfunding platform for creative ideas and personal causes, with secure donation system.
fullDescription: DreamArc is a platform designed to help individuals and startups raise funds for their creative ideas, personal causes, or social needs. It includes campaign creation, image uploads, secure donation system, deadline handling, and a testimonials section. Built with React and Firebase, it delivers a seamless and reliable experience for donors and campaign creators.
challengesFaced: Ensuring secure and valid donations, preventing duplicate entries, and handling deadline-based campaign visibility were difficult. Firebase rules also needed fine-tuning for security.
futurePlan: Add mobile responsiveness enhancements, multi-language support, donation analytics, and integration with PayPal.
